Text: BlackRock Inc. grew its stake in shares of Travelers Companies by 7.3% in the first quarter. BlackRock Inc. now owns 22,604,259 shares of the insurance provider's stock worth $3,100,401,000 after acquiring an additional 1,528,327 shares during the last quarter.
